table.name: quest_student
table.comment: Quest Student objects are defined by a civicrm_contact, and related civicrm_individual and quest_student records.

field.name: id
field.comment: Unique Student ID

field.name: contact_id
field.comment: FK to Contact ID

field.name: citizenship_status_id
field.title: US Citizenship Status
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: citizenship_country_id
field.title: Country of Citizenship
field.comment: Country of citizenship.

field.name: growup_country_id
field.title: Where did you grow up ?
field.comment: Country where person grew up.

field.name: nationality_country_id_1
field.title: Country of Heritage/Nationality
field.comment: Country(ries) of family's origin

field.name: nationality_country_id_2
field.title: Country(ries) of family's origin
field.comment: Country of persons nationality.

field.name: nationality_country_id_3
field.title: Country(ries) of family's origin
field.comment: Country of persons nationality.

field.name: ethnicity_id_1
field.title: Ethnicity 1
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: ethnicity_id_2
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: tribe_affiliation
field.comment: Specifies tribe if ethnicity is Native American.

field.name: tribe_enroll_date
field.comment: If ethnicity is Native American, date the person enrolled in their tribe (only MMYYYY is significant).

field.name: ethnicity_other
field.comment: Specifies ethnicity if ethnicity_id_1 value is Other.

field.name: home_area_id
field.title: Home Area
field.comment: Type of area primary home is in (e.g. Rural, Suburban). FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: years_in_us
field.title: Years in US
field.comment: Number of years person has lived in the United States.

field.name: first_language
field.comment: First language spoken by this person.

field.name: primary_language
field.comment: Primary language spoken at home.

field.name: is_partner_share
field.title: Partner Share
field.comment: OK to share this persons info with partner schools.

field.name: high_school_grad_year
field.title: High School Grad Year
field.comment: Year of high school graduation (only YYYY is significant).

field.name: parent_grad_college_id
field.title: Parent Graduation College
field.comment: Has any parent or guardian graduated from a 4-year college?

field.name: internet_access_id
field.title: Internet Access
field.comment: How do they access the internet. FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: internet_access_other
field.comment: Alternate response for how they access the internet.

field.name: is_home_computer
field.title: Home Computer
field.comment: Has a computer at home.

field.name: is_home_internet
field.title: Home Internet
field.comment: Has internet access at home.

field.name: is_take_SAT_ACT
field.title: Taken SAT ACT
field.comment: Plans on taking SAT or ACT test.

field.name: is_dismissed
field.title: Dismissed
field.comment: Dismissed from school.

field.name: explain_dismissed
field.comment: Dismissed question response.

field.name: is_convicted
field.title: Convicted
field.comment: Convicted from school.

field.name: explain_convicted
field.comment: Convicted question response.

field.name: study_method_id
field.title: Study Method
field.comment: How they plan on studying for SAT or ACT test. FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: educational_interest
field.comment: Which educational areas are they interested in. Multi-select checkbox array populates a delimited list civicrm_option_value IDs. Available options have civicrm_option_group.name = educational_interest.

field.name: educational_interest_other
field.title: Other Educational Interest
field.comment: Which other educational area are they interested in.

field.name: college_type
field.comment: Types of college they are interested in attending. Multi-select checkbox array populates a delimited list civicrm_option_value IDs. Available options have civicrm_option_group.name = college_type.

field.name: college_interest
field.comment: Which colleges are they interested in. Multi-select checkbox array populates a delimited list civicrm_option_value IDs. Available options have civicrm_option_group.name = college_interest.

field.name: college_interest_other
field.comment: Which other colleges are they interested in.

field.name: gpa_unweighted_id
field.title: GPA (unweighted)
field.comment: Unweighted Grade Point Average (GPA) range. FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: gpa_weighted_id
field.title: GPA (weighted)
field.comment: Weighted Grade Point Average (GPA) range. FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: is_class_ranking
field.title: Has Class Ranking
field.comment: Does students class have rankings.

field.name: class_rank
field.comment: Class rank (numeric value).

field.name: class_rank_percent_id
field.title: Percent class rank
field.comment: Class rank percent range. FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: class_num_students
field.comment: Total number of students in this persons class.

field.name: gpa_explanation
field.comment: Descriptive comments about students GPA.

field.name: test_tutoring
field.comment: Which tests have they received tutoring for. Multi-select checkbox array populates a delimited list civicrm_option_value IDs. Available options have civicrm_option_group.name = test.

field.name: number_siblings
field.comment: Number of siblings this student has.

field.name: fed_lunch_id
field.title: Federal Lunch Program Eligibility
field.comment: Federal lunch program eligibility. FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: financial_aid_applicant
field.comment: Plans to be a financial aid applicant to colleges.

field.name: register_standarized_tests
field.comment: Plans to use, or have fee waivers to register for standarized tests.

field.name: award_ranking_1_id
field.title: Award Ranking 1
field.comment: Rank the scholarship awards .

field.name: award_ranking_2_id
field.title: Award Ranking 2
field.comment: Rank the scholarship awards.

field.name: award_ranking_3_id
field.title: Award Ranking 3
field.comment: Rank the scholarship awards.

field.name: is_alternate_grading
field.title: Uses Alternate Grading
field.comment: Did this students school use alternate grading for any grade.

field.name: alternate_grading_explanation
field.comment: Explanation of alternate grading system.

field.name: heard_about_qb_id
field.title: How did you hear about QuestBridge?

field.name: heard_about_qb_name
field.title: reffrence form where you heard about QuestBridge

field.name: varsity_sports_list
field.comment: list of sports, interested in participating

field.name: arts_list
field.comment: list of arts, interested in participating

field.name: school_work
field.title: school work
field.comment: time of work during the school year
